messages.subject: Re: Anyone in Hawaii?
messages.msgSnippet: wow am i envious!  dh and i spent our honeymoon in hawaii (kauai and maui) and have talked about moving there for the last 3 years.  good luck with your move
messages.messageBody:
wow am i envious! dh and i spent our honeymoon in hawaii (kauai and maui) and have
talked about moving there for the last 3 years. good luck with your move and enjoy the
sunshine!

dina

>

> -Christy

messages.subject: Re: Anyone in Hawaii?
messages.msgSnippet: No, we won t be at the conference this year.  It s just too close to moving time, and we ll be shipping our car over too.  That s so nice that you remembered
messages.messageBody:
No, we won't be at the conference this year. It's just too close to
moving time, and we'll be shipping our car over too. That's so nice
that you remembered Darcy singing - she was so happy with herself
that she decided to sing even though she was so nervous.

We'll be in Hawai'i for 3 years, so any contacts would really be
appreciated. An organic farm on Kauai sounds amazing!

And hey, we'd love to meet up with anyone who comes for vacation
too :)

-Christy

messages.subject: Re: Anyone in Hawaii?
messages.msgSnippet: There was a pretty large (for the size of the island) homeschool group on O ahu. They had meetings on both sides of the island. I don t know specifically if
messages.messageBody:
There was a pretty large (for the size of the island) homeschool
group on O'ahu. They had meetings on both sides of the island. I
don't know specifically if there are/were any unschoolers but I'd be
surprised if there weren't at least a few.

Alysia

--- In unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com, "Christy Mahoney"
<unschooling1@...> wrote:
>
> We will be moving to Hawai'i, specifically to O'ahu, in June. We
> would love to find some other unschoolers there, and I've not
found
> anything promising in my online searches.
>
> I would really appreciate any contacts or information!
>
> Thanks so much,
> Christy
>

messages.subject: Re: Anyone in Hawaii?
messages.msgSnippet: Christy!  Will you be coming to Life is Good this year? I want to hear Darcy sing again, before you go... I know there is an unschooling family (who have an
messages.messageBody:
Christy! Will you be coming to Life is Good this year? I want to hear Darcy sing again,
before you go...

I know there is an unschooling family (who have an organic farm) on Kaua'i, and I think
there might be a couple of families on O'ahu. I have an unschooling friend from WA who
spends many weeks at their family home each year I can put you in touch with.

How long do you expect to be there?

Robin B.



--- In unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com, "Christy Mahoney" <unschooling1@...>
wrote:

> would love to find some other unschoolers there, and I've not found

>
> I would really appreciate any contacts or information!
>
> Thanks so much,
> Christy
>

messages.subject: Anyone in Hawaii?
messages.msgSnippet: We will be moving to Hawai i, specifically to O ahu, in June.  We would love to find some other unschoolers there, and I ve not found anything promising in my
messages.messageBody:
We will be moving to Hawai'i, specifically to O'ahu, in June. We
would love to find some other unschoolers there, and I've not found
anything promising in my online searches.

I would really appreciate any contacts or information!

Thanks so much,
Christy
